TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: Represents controls that act as scrollable containers for a collection of child elements.

span.span: Represents controls that act as scrollable containers for a collection of child elements.

summary.span: The children of this element support .

span.span: The children of this element support .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[UI 自動化用戶端的控制項模式對應](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)如需範例，可能會實作此控制項模式的控制項。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation

summary.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 此結構包含的快取 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 的控制項模式的屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation

summary.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含目前 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 的控制項模式的屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須從與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用取得、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用取得先前使用指定之屬性的快取的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontallyScrollableProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目傳遞給函式傳回的集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]根的子代且符合一組屬性條件的項目。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalScrollPercentProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目會傳遞至函式會傳回目前的內容區域內可檢視區域的水平和垂直捲動百分比。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current horizontal and vertical scroll percentages of the viewable region within the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalViewSizeProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目會傳遞至函式會傳回可檢視區域的垂直和水平大小，為總計內容區域的百分比。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current vertical and horizontal sizes of the viewable region as percentages of the total content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

summary.span: Specifies that scrolling should not be performed.

span.span: Specifies that scrolling should not be performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . -1 值可以取代為欄位。The value -1 can be substituted for the field. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自然後用於捲動內容區域的頂端可檢視區域。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 例如，傳遞給方法的模式識別項擷取感興趣之控制項模式，從指定。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . MemberSignature.Value: public void Scroll (System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount horizontalAmount, System.Windows.Automation.ScrollAmount verticalAmount);

Public Sub Scroll (horizontalAmount As ScrollAmount, verticalAmount As ScrollAmount)

param.name: horizontalAmount
param.span: The horizontal increment specific to the control.

span.span: The horizontal increment specific to the control.

param.span: The vertical increment specific to the control.

summary.span: Scrolls the visible region of the content area horizontally and vertically.

span.span: Scrolls the visible region of the content area horizontally and vertically.

[!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#106)]

span.span: A control supports values exclusively for horizontal or vertical scrolling but a value is passed in.

exception.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.

span.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetScrollPercent (double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetScrollPercent(float64 horizontalPercent, float64 verticalPercent) cil managed
Public Sub SetScrollPercent (horizontalPercent As Double, verticalPercent As Double)
public: void SetScrollPercent(double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);

param.name: horizontalPercent
param.span: The percentage of the total horizontal content area.

span.span: The percentage of the total horizontal content area.

param.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

param.name: verticalPercent
param.span: The percentage of the total vertical content area.

span.span: The percentage of the total vertical content area.

param.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

summary.span: Sets the horizontal and/or vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the .

span.span: Sets the horizontal and/or vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當控制項的內容區域大於可見區域時，這個方法會有用。This method is only useful when the content area of the control is larger than the visible region. 傳入值表示沒有任何以指定的方向捲動。Passing in the value indicates that there is no scrolling in the specified direction. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自然後用於捲動內容區域的最上層左 '家用' 的位置可檢視區域。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top left 'home' position of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

exception.span: A value that cannot be converted to a double is passed in.

span.span: A value that cannot be converted to a double is passed in.

exception.span: A value greater than 100 or less than 0 is passed in (except -1, which is equivalent to ).

span.span: A value greater than 100 or less than 0 is passed in (except -1, which is equivalent to ).

exception.span: The and values are normalized to either 0% or 100%.

span.span: The and values are normalized to either 0% or 100%.

exception.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.

span.span: An attempt is made to scroll in an unsupported direction.
